```{r setup}
library(dplyr)
library(VicmapR)
```

# How to Query Data

```{r query, eval = FALSE}
vicmap_query(layer = "datavic:VMHYDRO_WATERCOURSE_DRAIN")
```

```{r query_collect, eval = FALSE}
vicmap_query(layer = "datavic:VMHYDRO_WATERCOURSE_DRAIN") %>%
  head(50) %>%
  collect()
```

```{r show_query, eval = FALSE}
vicmap_query(layer = "datavic:VMHYDRO_WATERCOURSE_DRAIN") %>%
  head(50) %>%
  show_query()
```
